actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I. The next meeting is scheduled for 9:00 a.m. on August 12, 2025.

Pursuant to 2 U.S.C. 501(b), and the order of the House of January 3, 2025, the Speaker appointed the following member of the House to the House Communications Standards Commission: Mr. Bean of Florida.
The House received a communication from the Honorable Kat Cammack, Member of Congress. Mrs. Cammack submitted her resignation from the House Franking Commission, effective immediately.
The House received a message from the Senate. The Senate passed S. 1071, S. 1155, S. 2682, H.R. 3944 amended, H.R. 2170, and H.R. 2808.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Rev. Kevin Peterman, 19th Street Baptist Church, Washington, D.C.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Mike Kelly to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
